news.description: Retrieves news, notices, and event information for the launcher's main content area.

wallpapers.description: Fetches launcher wallpapers and the title for the current version/update.

socials.description: Provides links and icon data for official social media channels.

localpath-index.description: Provides a localpath index to quickly check the integrity of files, used during repair request for launcher.

client_manifest.description: Contains download, update, and repair manifests for the game client.
